topic.title: What will happen if America’s internet is collapsed?
topic.body:
After the brutal Hong Kong security law marched into the civilized world, Hong Kong's cyberspace may collapse.  

**Blessed by the constitutional system on Gun Rights and Human Rights, America’s internet will not collapse so easily.  **

It seems that due to the brutal GFW system that covers too many terrible facts, quite many ordinary people in the USA don’t see the dangerous toxicity of Coronavirus.  That’s why some people still organized **“Covid party”, which killed them quickly ** (  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/12/us/30-year-old-covid-party-death.html  )

Even the merchant-minded President Donald Trump underestimated the poisoning power of the GFW.  Trump refused to wear masks in public, but Vice President Mike Pence insisted on wearing masks. Finally Donald Trump had to change his mind.  

So several months after Covid19 outbreak in the USA, Donald Trump finally **put on face masks** in July. 
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-53378439   
** Coronavirus: Donald Trump wears face mask for the first time ** 

##**Data Kills **
**Data don’t kill people directly. Those who maneuver data improperly may kill many people. **
At the early stage of Covid19 pandemics, Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen sent messages to the USA that **the toxicity of Wuhan virus is very dangerous**.  But that important message was ignored by some politicians. 


Leaders who underestimate the trend of data development **don’t murder people directly**, but the wrong signal produced by the malfunction of data analysis may result in wrong actions by many ordinary people. 

## **Donald Trump is NOT the worst … ** ## 
**Apparently, Donald Trump is not a great leader, especially at the unprecedentedly–severe stage of history with highly-poisonous pandemics going out of control!   However, this message won’t put all the blames on Trump, since Donald Trump is still NOT the worst choice for American people.  Compared with other candidates, Donald Trump doesn’t have too complicated business relationships with East Asia, which is heavily polluted by the terrible virus produced by the atheism gang. **  

The fact is that despite many people being awakened up by the dangerous situation, which harms  America's finest tradition that respects Gun Rights and Human Rights, 
Investigations Into The "Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation" For Medical Malpractice & Crimes Against Humanity 
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/we-call-investigations-bill-melinda-gates-foundation-medical-malpractice-crimes-against 
the situation of cyberspace monopolized by Google, Microsoft can’t be changed in short time.  

Even Donald Trump’s fighting against those "fake media" can’t change this situation quickly. 
## ** So what will happen if America’s internet is also collapsed? ** 

In such case, the decentralized website of Zeronet https://zeronet.io/ will serve as a good solution for people to transmit revolutionary messages. With Bitcoin cryptography, the safety is higher than Telegram.  As an innovation of web technology, there's not any censorship, even NO SMS verification process is required as incurred on Telegram.  The new Peer-to-Peer data transmission will be a new tide of cyberspace revolution. 


## **Users can make quasi-administrator’s customization of ZeroNet … **
Full details are available at the below URL:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1596087920_1PPHzUHjZ77arm8QhzTWpWL5H6ECqd9oeD/+quasi+administrator+s+customization+of+ZeroNet 
** 零網用戶的准管理員操作 **
(Important note: The URL with the special beginning http://127.0.0.1:43110  should be opened by Zeronet App  https://zeronet.io/ ,  ) 

### ** Photo Illustration for New Users **
http://127.0.0.1:43110/168x9d56MSBjrq6TYoDaSvxXSux3nPzw37/?Topic:3_1PPHzUHjZ77arm8QhzTWpWL5H6ECqd9oeD/ 

Another ZeroNet webpage for reference:
### ** Liberate Hong Kong, Revolution of Our Time — New Approach to Hong Kong Peace Revolution ** 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B4vYHwkCywhjs3GMxFSvdCraYj5dh9LTV/?Topic:5_1PPHzUHjZ77arm8QhzTWpWL5H6ECqd9oeD/ 

Remarks:
1) More details about Zeronet:
1.1) On ZeroNet, all webpages start with the special URL  
http://127.0.0.1:43110/ 
The code 43110 represents the port used for secure data transmission by Bitcoin-encrypted technology. 
1.2) All zeronet webpages can be easily accessed, only after Zeronet app is launched on user’s equipment. 
There’re different versions of Zeronet, for different system environments such as Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, etc. 
Full details of which are available in the below URL
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet#user-content-how-to-join 

Please choose the version of Zeronet suitable for the system environment of your equipment. 

Before visiting ZeroNet webpage 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/ 
** Zeronet app should be launched in your equipment at first. **

topic.title: the Trap on Coronavirus
topic.body:
Why some people still organized “Covid party”, despite the fact that the virus killed many people quickly (  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/12/us/30-year-old-covid-party-death.html  ) ? 

It’s due to the over-entertaining environment that has partially eroded ** the corner of American culture — Puritan Christendom **. 

## **1.1) The Trap of Atheism ** 
There are no absolute atheists, for one simple reason — if they can’t deny the fact that each individual has a certain sense of "holy space" in their soul, which may be related either to the "sacred" love of their loved ones,  or the "holy” passion of their occupation, then they can't deny the fact that there’s a certain sense of "holy” God image in their soul. This can be taken as a simple "scientific” logic, a common sense, without the need of large scale of geometry formulas to prove the logic.

To protect the universal sense of Holy Image of God in everyone's soul, there’d be the universal principle that respects gun rights and human rights.

topic.title: The Biggest Enemy of Donald Trump …
topic.body:
The Biggest Enemy of Donald Trump is neither Joe Biden, nor the dictator Xi Jin Ping — the hooligan leader of the atheism gang in Asia, but **the capricious mentality of Trump himself**. 

The Biggest Enemy of Joe Biden is not Donald Trump either, but Biden's distorted pursuit of wealth that involves very complicated business relationships with East Asia, which may ultimately result in some people finally to be charged with   ** "treason" against America **. 

Some capricious words and behaviours by Trump did incur troubles against many people, and against Donald Trump himself.

However, some of his remarks hold reason, and should be treated seriously. 
"If I don't win the election, China will own the United States — you will have to learn to speak Chinese!" Trump said.
https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-says-americans-will-learn-to-speak-chinese-loses-biden-2020-8

###**To have to learn Chinese? That’s just a minor point!! **

If America is totally polluted by the atheism virus, with American society ruled like the atheism gang as that in East Asia, with the so-called term "Chinese Model", then the number of **infected patients** would be tremendously reduced immediately (**highly possible to be “Zero” infection**), NOT due to good vaccines developed in time, but due to **media control that forbids report of any negative news** which may harm the dictatorship by the atheism gang!

Furthermore,  in order to protect the glory of the ruling party, the facts that hundreds of thousands of patients died of Covid19 would not be reported either, maybe just with a few cases allowed to be reported, so as to accompany the propaganda on the ruling party's care on its own people! 

###The large number of people who perished would be totally silenced down, just like former whistle-blower Chinese Doctor Lee Wen Liang, besides millions of other people … 
( about 20 million mobile users disappeared by the end of March  https://www.epochtimes.com/gb/20/3/23/n11965551.htm ) 

The above is just the consequences that can be seen, then there will be many **indescribable, unreported consequences**, such as organ harvest, with healthy people disappeared thoroughly in the world, while organ transplant business going bustling in various hospitals … 

The notorious GFW has covered too many facts of cruel truth unknown by ordinary people in the USA.  The merchant-minded President Trump, apparently not with vicious purpose to cover the truth, but with some money-worship mind just in order **to keep the stock market from panic**, pretended not to see the danger of coronavirus, and just called it a variation of common flu.  It caused confusion in the society, and reduced the vigilance of the majority of American people.  USA failed to take precautious measures like Taiwan did, and the virus spread out of control.  Due to over-preference on the stock market performance than the safety of people’s lives, Trump's mistake led to contrary results, with big plunge of stock market that may trigger other troubles as well.

Trump's mistake can be termed as **a serious negligence** of his presidency work. 

Compared with other crimes such as **treason against America**, Trump's mistake is not so serious.  

In short, due to the coronavirus spread too wide, Donald Trump is certainly not a great leader, however, **he will NOT be the worst one**  in America's history.  

##In fact, Donald Trump is himself a victim of the virus. 
He simply underestimated the poisoning power of the GFW, which covered too many true death polls in East Asia that were unimaginable even for ordinary Chinese people, not to mention American netizens. 

Some of the technocrats who gave advanced technology and equipments to the atheism gang in China should be more seriously blamed or punished, since **they did it on purpose**. **It’s more vicious than Trump’s mistake**. 

Things are improving.  Police is banned from putting a knee to a person's head or neck 
https://edition.cnn.com/2020/07/09/us/schenectady-police-officer-knee-on-man-video/index.html 

Several months after Covid19 outbreak in the USA, Donald Trump finally put on face masks in July.
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-53378439 

Thanks to the powerful constitution system, no leaders can distort America's society at their will. After many troubles were caused by his own capricious words and behaviours, Donald Trump continues to grow on his first presidency. 

His mistake doesn’t go so far as treason against American people. Since he is not the worst choice, Donald Trump deserves people’s support for a second presidency.  

**It’s not because so many people love him, just because he is NOT the man who deserves the deepest hate by people living on this planet …  ** 

[Some special information ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B4vYHwkCywhjs3GMxFSvdCraYj5dh9LTV/?Topic:8_1PUkWFbzkD4dyRZ2vH3G8WeQw4m2UVPA2p/Some+special+information+on+Coronavirus)

topic.title: The Terrible Secrets behind Antifa …
topic.body:
##The "Specter” of Communism — An absurdity of self-contradiction 
https://www.goodreads.com/quotes/75939-a-specter-is-haunting-europe-the-specter-of-communism-all-the 
The founder of Communism, Karl Marx himself described Communism as a "Specter".  **The concepts of "Specter", “Ghost” or “Devil” etc. don’t belong to scientific sector, but religious pursuit instead**.  What Karl Marx worshipped might be either a "Specter", “Ghost” or “Devil”, or a distorted “God” image in his soul, or any other object, by enhancing the communism promotion to a "Specter” level, such mentality is itself against the doctrine of “Atheism”.  

Religion-level communists are themselves against atheism dictatorship.  Chinese Dictator Emperor Xi Jin Ping’s father Xi Zhong Xun was another famous example on this aspect.  **Communism often emphasizes equality on wealth, which is itself contradictory to brutal dictatorship that can easily distort justice**.  So when the notorious Cultural Revolution occurred, simply triggered by the natural instinct of conscience to protect his belief of communism, Xi Zhong Xun himself fought bravely against the oppression by the atheism regime. 

###The biggest failure of communism is that communism is itself contradictory to atheism.  
Very brutal absurdities occurred then.  **All the dictators demanded their subordinates worship the supreme leaders as a "Sacred" "God" or " Holy Authority"; meanwhile, on the other hand, in their daily life, they should not treat any thing as "sacred" or "Holy", since which could easily overthrow the ideology of "atheism”**.   

No one can totally represent God.  However, long-term, passionate efforts on any topic will result in a special realm that’s **going with unlimited approximation to God’s altar, even including atheism**. 

For example, many atheists believe atheism should be taken as the highest principle of truth. By that logic, in order to protect their highest truth, they should not retreat from protecting the truth with gun rights;  then the scientific logic automatically applies — without monopoly of gun rights, no one in America can execute dictatorship as brutally as the atheism gang does in China, by any concept — including **medieval Christendom or modern atheism**.  

Antifa and some riots behind by the movement of Black Lives Matter may be supported by very complicated operation of the atheism gang. 

**Communism can destroy many things once its inherent self contradictory troubles go out of control!! ** 

That’s why American people should keep high vigilance against Antifa, besides the serious infiltration of American society by various viruses produced by the atheism gang, including the anti-religion cultural virus disguised as atheism, besides **the dangerous coronavirus **.

[Some special information ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B4vYHwkCywhjs3GMxFSvdCraYj5dh9LTV/?Topic:8_1PUkWFbzkD4dyRZ2vH3G8WeQw4m2UVPA2p/Some+special+information+on+Coronavirus)

Ordinary people should at least avoid other man-made disasters, just due to the over-entertaining environment, which even made a 30-year-old man think the coronavirus was just a hoax and attended a “Covid party” that killed him…

1.1) The Trap of Atheism
There are no absolute atheists, for one simple reason — if they can’t deny the fact that each individual has a certain sense of "holy space" in their soul, which may be related either to the "sacred" love of their loved ones, or the "holy” passion of their occupation, then they can't deny the fact that there’s a certain sense of "holy” God image in their soul. 
** This can be taken as a simple "scientific” logic, a common sense, without the need of large scale of geometry formulas to prove the logic. **
彻头彻尾的、绝对意义上的“无神论”信徒是不存在的，只要他不敢否认有“精神”存在，那么他就无法否认每个人的“精神”空间里都存在着或多或少的“神圣”的情感 — 这种“神圣”的情感，无论是在工作层面的，还是生活层面的，总是伴随着每个生命。 而只要有“神圣”的精神空间存在，就有“神灵”的属性存在于他的精神空间。 对于这一点，共产主义的鼻祖马克思非常雄辩，但也犯错误，即使他不信上帝，而是信仰撒旦魔鬼，撒旦魔鬼也仍然属于邪恶色彩的“神灵”，与“无神论”是自相矛盾的。

There is a project, named Pearl Peace, mainly focused on promotion of traditional American culture — Puritan Christendom. It’s supported by several Christian volunteers, and under the care of some honorable senior Christians who may need more time to get familiar with Zeronet.  As can be understood, Zeronet seems a little challenging even for young people who are not skilled at computers, so it’d take more time for senior people to get accustomed to Zeronet. 
After careful observation, for text messages on Zeronet, data flow has been much improved, at quicker speed than the past.  For large data of video file, there may be a long way to go … 

However, the special feature of decentralized server, uncensored medias, besides

In fact, there are tons of messages available.  However, only some positive information will be displayed, for Puritanism Resurrection, and for Peace of America …

1597510687_12QcU9x7iK1XjguRKQKKhyc6Erguz.body:
A senior Christian taught us: 
“A man must never wrestle (fight) with pigs!”  
“In doing so, you get all dirty and smelly, while the pig is very happy and in his element.”
“人绝对不能与猪搏斗！”这位老师说。 “如果那么做，您会变得肮脏而有臭味，而这头猪却非常快乐，正符合它的天性。”

In a certain sense, America has been downgraded to semi-jungle environment.  However, so long as the constitutional system is NOT totally overthrown, which could result in gun rights being monopolized, the vitality of America will be restored gradually. 

In-depth discussion on any topics may change people's capricious mind to be more prudent, more serious. 

Science can be helpful in many cases, but science can’t represent the almighty God.  At certain stage of history, before the unknown factors are solved, prudent mind can help save many people's lives — coronavirus is the example.  

Just a simple topic on face masks, 
[Why face mask is a must? ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1596775198_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h94FKXg)

there can be some unusually-strange response.  

However, at least there’s some reasonable feedback, such as 
“I will wear masks because i don't want to contribute to the damaging to my country ... “ 

So America’s tradition of Puritan Christendom will not be totally destroyed. 
...
The major feature of America’s peculiarity, which makes the United States of America different from the rest part of the world, is the constitutional system that respects Gun Rights and Human Rights.

… , without which, the situation of America would have been worse at the time of coronavirus … 
[Let Facts Speak the Truth ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B4vYHwkCywhjs3GMxFSvdCraYj5dh9LTV/?Topic:7_1PUkWFbzkD4dyRZ2vH3G8WeQw4m2UVPA2p) 

There’s another unusual phenomenon in America. 
With the death poll going to be hundreds of thousands, there could still be some people who deliberately got infected with the virus …  
[The Secrets Behind Coronavirus … 新冠病毒的黑幕 1) ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B4vYHwkCywhjs3GMxFSvdCraYj5dh9LTV/?Topic:2_1GVfTPghbWnBKbRWpYpkRCKgMi4wFecie2) 

Such phenomenon was difficult to understand in the past.  However, after seeing the abnormal responses by some netizens on the simple topic of face masks, it can be concluded that American culture is already heavily polluted by the atheism virus before the coronavirus kills so many people. 
 
It’s not only a matter of mentality or attitude, it’s become a life-or-death issue for people … 

Meanwhile, it’d be better not waste time arguing with some hardheaded people who hate Donald Trump more than Joe Biden, simply because of Trump’s negligence, but didn’t see that other people may be involved with more dangerous crimes of "treason" against America …

It’s suggested the post creator be allowed to pin about 3-5 messages to the top.  
Youtube may allow only 1 message pinned to the top? Since they allow the video owner to delete vicious comments, so 1 message at the top will be enough.  At Zeronet,  since emphasis is put on uncensored freedom, it’s suggested that about 3-5 messages be allowed to be **pinned to the top**. 

With the function of **Pin comments to the top**, good messages can be pinned by the message composer at the top, easily visible by audience.  In this way, a few powerful messages will beat down hundreds or thousands of rubbish comments. 
###The above is just a kind idea for Zeronet’s long term prosperity. 
If there’re better ideas, please share it.
